title: Pokemon GO Teams Thread
body:
Hey guys! I know a lot of you play, so I'm just making a thread to keep track of who's in each team. Y'know, so you guys can find your friends and distinguish yourself from your enemies. Just post and I'll update the list. 

---

{{item:3087}}   **INSTINCT**
